channel.title: I need help to create a server
channel.description: I would like to make a server. ive never coded before and i quit runescape a couple of weeks ago. If someone could direct me to a tutorial on how to code it would be great.... of course you must know ive NEVER CODED BEOFORE. Anyway thanks in advance Dark rang174

item.title: I need help to create a server
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Try this.

Since RuneScape Private Servers are written in Java,

It is essential to understand basic Java first,

So I would start by going through those tutorials, They are pretty great.

Read full topic
